title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. 

Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart. 

Steps to reproduce: 1. [Please provide the missing steps to reproduce]
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it contains a valid value, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
SR: Set the externalized text in the chart title.
